page.title: 05Leisure
page.content: Fishing on the River Parrett. Up river from the Parrett Hatches (where the water level is controlled) is a lovely stretch of river called 'Parrett works'. There are many nice spots for fishing here and you can catch fishes such as dace, gudgeon, trout, carp, rudd, perch and minows. People have caught some good size fish on the river Parrett. Many competitions are held here to catch the heaviest fish. So really, this stretch is a very nice spot on the Parrett. You may not always have a good days fishing but it is a great spot to spend your spare time.
